cmdDescrp: Sets up the bot for your server

errors.general: Error during bot setup. Please try again or contact support.
errors.timeout: Setup wizard timed out. Please run /bot-setup again.
errors.timeoutInactivity: Setup timed out after 5 minutes of inactivity.
errors.failedToUpdate: Failed to update configuration. Please try again or contact support.
errors.noRoleSelected: No role selected. Please try again.
errors.noChannelSelected: No channel selected. Please try again.
errors.noCategorySelected: No category selected. Please try again.
errors.noForumSelected: No forum selected. Please try again.
errors.noActionSelected: No action selected. Please try again.
errors.noGracePeriodSelected: No grace period selected. Please try again.
errors.everyoneNotAllowed: You cannot use @everyone as the staff role!
errors.serverOnly: This command can only be used in a server!
errors.roleSelectTimeout: Role selection timed out. Please run /bot-setup again.
errors.roleAddError: An error occurred while saving roles. Please try again.

rateLimit.exceeded: Bot setup is being modified too frequently. Please try again in {minutes} minutes.

welcome.title: Welcome to Cogworks Bot Setup
welcome.description:
**Thank you for choosing Cogworks Bot!**

This wizard will guide you through the complete setup process.

**What we'll configure:**
• Global Staff Role (optional)
• Ticket System (optional)
• Application System (optional)
• Announcement System (optional)
• Bait Channel (Anti-Bot) (optional)
• Staff & Admin Roles (optional)

**Estimated time:** 5-10 minutes
**Tip:** You can skip any optional steps and configure them later!
welcome.clickToStart: Click **Start Setup** to begin configuring your bot!
welcome.continueDescription:
**Some systems are already configured!**

This wizard will help you set up any missing systems.
welcome.continueCTA: Click **Continue Setup** to configure the remaining systems!
welcome.systemConfiguredSkip: **Tip:** Already configured systems will be automatically skipped!

staffRole.title: Global Staff Role Configuration
staffRole.description:
**What is a Global Staff Role?**
This role grants members access to:
• View and respond to all tickets
• Manage bot configurations
• Access administrative features

**Important Notes:**
This is optional - you can skip this step
You can change this role later
Multiple staff/admin roles can be added separately
staffRole.question: Would you like to enable a Global Staff Role?
staffRole.selectDescription:
**Please select the role from the dropdown below:**

**Tip:** Choose a role that your staff members already have.
Make sure the role exists and is not @everyone
staffRole.selectStep: Select a role from the menu below

ticket.title: Ticket System Setup
ticket.description:
**Would you like to configure the ticket system?**

The ticket system allows users to create private support tickets.

**This includes:**
• Main ticket channel (where users click to create tickets)
• Ticket category (where active tickets are created)
• Archive forum (where closed tickets are stored)

**You can skip this and set it up later with `/ticket-setup`**
ticket.channelSelectDescription:
Select the text channel where users will create tickets.

This channel will have a "Create Ticket" button message.
ticket.categorySelectDescription:
Select the category where active tickets will be created.

Each ticket will be a private channel in this category.
ticket.archiveSelectDescription:
Select the forum channel where closed tickets will be archived.

Each closed ticket will create a thread in this forum.
ticket.archiveMsg: Ticket archives will be posted here. Do not delete this thread.

application.title: Application System Setup
application.description:
**Would you like to configure the application system?**

The application system allows users to submit applications.

**This includes:**
• Main application channel (where users click to apply)
• Application category (where active applications are created)
• Archive forum (where closed applications are stored)

**You can skip this and set it up later with `/application-setup`**
application.channelSelectDescription:
Select the text channel where users will submit applications.

This channel will have an "Apply" button message.
application.categorySelectDescription:
Select the category where active applications will be created.

Each application will be a private channel in this category.
application.archiveSelectDescription:
Select the forum channel where closed applications will be archived.

Each closed application will create a thread in this forum.
application.buttonMsg: Click the button below to submit an application!
application.archiveMsg: Application archives will be posted here. Do not delete this thread.

announcement.title: Announcement System Setup
announcement.description:
**Would you like to configure the announcement system?**

The announcement system allows you to send announcements with role pings.

**This includes:**
• Minecraft role (for Minecraft announcements)
• Default announcement channel

**You can skip this and set it up later with `/announcement-setup`**
announcement.roleSelectDescription:
Select the role that will be pinged for Minecraft announcements.

This is typically your Minecraft player role.
announcement.channelSelectDescription:
Select the text channel where announcements will be sent by default.

You can override this per announcement.

baitChannel.title: Bait Channel (Anti-Bot) Setup
baitChannel.description:
**Would you like to configure the bait channel system?**

The bait channel system helps detect and remove bots automatically.

**This includes:**
• Bait channel (monitored for bot activity)
• Action type (kick, ban, or timeout)
• Grace period (time before action is taken)
• Log channel (optional, for logging detections)

**You can skip this and set it up later with `/bait-channel-setup`**
baitChannel.channelSelectDescription:
Select the text channel to use as a bait channel.

**Warning:** Any messages in this channel may trigger security actions!
baitChannel.actionSelectDescription:
Choose what action to take when a bot is detected:

• **Kick:** Remove the user from the server
• **Ban:** Permanently ban the user
• **Timeout:** Temporarily mute the user
baitChannel.gracePeriodDescription:
Choose how long to wait before taking action:

• Longer grace periods reduce false positives
• Shorter grace periods act faster on bots
baitChannel.logChannelDescription:
Select a channel where bot detections will be logged.

**This is optional** - click Skip if you don't want logging.
baitChannel.setupEmbedDescription: This channel is now monitored by the anti-bot system.
baitChannel.setupEmbedWarningValue: Regular users should **NOT** post in this channel. Any messages here may trigger security actions.

role.title: Role Management Setup
role.description:
**Would you like to add staff or admin roles?**

These roles can be used throughout the bot for permissions.

**Role types:**
• **Staff Roles:** For support team members
• **Admin Roles:** For administrators

**You can skip this and add roles later with `/add-role`**
role.typeSelectDescription:
Choose whether this is a staff role or admin role:

• **Staff:** For support/moderator roles
• **Admin:** For administrator roles
role.selectDescription:
Select the role from the dropdown below.

You can add an optional alias in the next step.

update.title: Bot Configuration Manager
update.question: **What would you like to do?**
update.staffRoleUpdated: Global Staff Role has been updated to {role}.
update.staffRoleDisabled: Global Staff Role has been disabled.

summary.title: Setup Complete!
summary.description:
**Your bot has been configured successfully!**

The following settings have been saved:
summary.whatsNextValue:
• Start using your configured systems
• Customize further with individual commands
• Run `/bot-setup` again anytime to update settings
summary.footer: Need help? Check our documentation or contact support

cancel.title: Setup Cancelled
cancel.message: Bot setup has been cancelled. No changes were made. Run /bot-setup again anytime to configure your bot.

logs.couldNotPin: Could not pin thread (max pins may be reached)
logs.baitChannelSaved: Bait channel config saved: channelId={channelId}, enabled={enabled}
logs.couldNotEditOnTimeout: Could not edit reply on timeout:
logs.rateLimit: Rate limit exceeded for bot setup in guild {guildId}
